info.name: VectorRectangle
info.comment: Extends the Vector class with support for generating rectangles.

description.p: VectorRectangle extends the Vector class with the ability to generate rectangular paths.

field.name: Dimensions
field.comment: Dimension flags define whether individual dimension fields contain fixed or relative values.

description.p: The following dimension flags are supported:

types.type: The Height value is a fixed coordinate.
The Width value is a fixed coordinate.
The X value is a fixed coordinate.
The Y value is a fixed coordinate.
The RoundX value is a fixed coordinate.
The RoundY value is a fixed coordinate.
The Height value is a relative coordinate.
The Width value is a relative coordinate.
The X value is a relative coordinate.
The Y value is a relative coordinate.
The RoundX value is a relative coordinate.
The RoundY value is a relative coordinate.

field.name: Height
field.comment: The height of the rectangle. Can be expressed as a fixed or relative coordinate.

description.p: The height of the rectangle is defined here as either a fixed or relative value. Negative values are permitted (this will flip the rectangle on the vertical axis).

field.name: RoundX
field.comment: Specifies the size of rounded corners on the horizontal axis.

description.p: The corners of a rectangle can be rounded by setting the RoundX and RoundY values. Each value is interpreted as a radius along the relevant axis. A value of zero (the default) turns off this feature.

field.name: RoundY
field.comment: Specifies the size of rounded corners on the vertical axis.

description.p: The corners of a rectangle can be rounded by setting the RoundX and RoundY values. Each value is interpreted as a radius along the relevant axis. A value of zero (the default) turns off this feature.

field.name: Width
field.comment: The width of the rectangle. Can be expressed as a fixed or relative coordinate.

description.p: The width of the rectangle is defined here as either a fixed or relative value. Negative values are permitted (this will flip the rectangle on the horizontal axis).

field.name: X
field.comment: The left-side of the rectangle. Can be expressed as a fixed or relative coordinate.

description.p: The position of the rectangle on the x-axis is defined here as a fixed or relative coordinate.

field.name: Y
field.comment: The top of the rectangle. Can be expressed as a fixed or relative coordinate.

description.p: The position of the rectangle on the y-axis is defined here as a fixed or relative coordinate.
